DOC.detailed_description: This Study enroll 100 patient total . Patients enrol upon meet certain inclusion criterion , include GSV duplex-sonography result consent . They enrol base clinically indicated requirement coronary artery bypass grafting use saphenous vein graft . The study prospective , randomize repeated measure control trial base patient 's ability receive control eSVS Mesh treatment . Graft patency , MACCE 6 24 month mesh non mesh GSV graft implantation measure finding qualification GSV preoperative duplex sonography compare intraoperative finding GSV harvest order evaluate safety eSVS mesh role preoperative GSV duplex sonography .
